item.title: Three men guilty of harassing BBC journalist over A Very British Cult documentary
item.description: All three are members of Lighthouse, a group investigated for a BBC documentary and podcast in 2023

item.title: BTS stand to make $1bn as they announce mammoth comeback tour
item.description: It's the K-pop band's first tour since completing compulsory military service in South Korea.

item.title: We choose Denmark over US, Greenland's PM says
item.description: It is the strongest statement by a leader of the Danish territory since US President Donald Trump renewed plans to annex it.

item.title: Hundreds from Met Police declare Freemasons links
item.description: Membership of the Freemasons or similar organisations became declarable in December.

item.title: World central banks 'stand in solidarity' with Fed chair after US threatens criminal charges
item.description: Eleven central banks have backed Jerome Powell after the US launched a criminal investigation into the US Fed.
